alert.note: Alert for Indian River; Martin; Okeechobee; St. Lucie (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 12 at 6:49AM EST by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...Locally Dense Fog Developing From the Treasure Coast to Lake Okeechobee... At 650 AM, surface observations, traffic cameras and satellite imagery showed locally dense fog had developed across Indian River, Saint Lucie, Martin and southern Okeechobee Counties. This area includes Sebastian, Fellsmere, Vero Beach, Fort Pierce, Port Saint Lucie, Stuart, Indiantown and Okeechobee. Persons driving in or near this area, including Interstate 95 and the Florida Turnpike, should expect to encounter visibilities dropping to one quarter mile or less at times in this area. If driving in dense fog, slow down, use your low beam headlights and leave extra driving distance between your vehicle and the one in front of you. The fog should burn off between 800 and 900 AM.

area.areaDesc: Indian River; Martin; Okeechobee; St. Lucie
